document.docAuthor: Lai, Yi-Te, Chang, Chih-Han & Chen, Jiun-Hong
document.masterDocTitle: Two new species of Helobdella Blanchard 1896 (Hirudinida: Rhynchobdellida: Glossiphoniidae) from Taiwan, with a checklist of hirudinea fauna of the island

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Two new species of Helobdella Blanchard 1896 (Hirudinida: Rhynchobdellida: Glossiphoniidae) from Taiwan, with a checklist of hirudinea fauna of the island

heading.emphasis: Checklist of Hirudinea fauna in Taiwan

subSubSection.paragraph:
Families after
Sawyer ( 1986 )
; remarks and common synonyms (syn.) listed in brackets. Codes: * = exotic and introduced, - = native or endemic, # = uncertain affinities. For some species not all synonyms are given here as these may be readily found elsewhere (e.g.
Yang, 1996
).

7 . *?
Helobdella octatestisaca
n. sp.
Lai et Chang, 2008

8 . *?
Helobdella melananus
n. sp.
Lai et Chang, 2008

[many synonyms -- see
Yang ( 1996 )
. The species found in Ryukyu islands has been named as
Haemadipsa japonica
var. ryukyuana
because of the different external morphology from
H. japonica (
Oka, 1910
)
. The specimens we collected in Taiwan matched the description of external morphology of
H. japonica
var. Ryukyuana
. However, the obvious differences between
H. japonica
var. Ryukyuana
and
H. japonica
inferred that they may be two different species.]

[
Haemadipsa japonica
var. taiwana
Oka, 1910
;
Tritetrabdella taiwana
Sawyer, 1986
]

[
Scaptobdella blanchardi
Oka, 1910
;
Odontobdella blanchardi
Oka, 1923
]
